definitions.title: n.pr.gent.
definitions.body: named with Bab., Chald., Assyr., ´[[שׁוֹעַ וְק]]:([[פְּקוֹד וְ]]) Ez Eze 23:23 Šô‘a and Ḳô‘a; identif. by Dl:Pa 235 with As. Sutû, Kutû (abbrev. Su (? v. [[שׁוֹעַ]]) and [by infer.] Ku), E. of Tigris, on border of Elam and Media; cf. COT:Ez Eze 23:23 Dr:Hast. iii, KOA; but [[קוֹעַ]] = Kutû now doubted by Wkl:Altor, Forsch. ii. 2 (1899), 54
